long_description: Remarkably compact, the OnGuard K-9 Folding Bike Lock combines the toughness of a U-lock with the versatility of a cable lock. Constructed of hardened steel plates, the K-9 Folding Lock features an OnGuard pick-, pull-, and drill-proof cylinder with sliding keyhole cover. Once unfolded, the K-9 has the length to secure frames and wheels to a bike rack or other solid object. Included mounting bracket features easy, push-button release, and bracket attaches to the water bottle holder or straps to other parts of the bike. OnGuard K-9 Folding Bike Lock comes with 2 keys.
short_description: Remarkably compact, the OnGuard K-9 Folding Bike Lock combines the toughness of a U-lock with the versatility of a cable lock.
